moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Water Sport
moves.description: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

moves.name: Horn Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Aqua Ring
moves.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

moves.name: Horn Drill
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. If it hits, the target faints instantly.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Soak
moves.description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

moves.name: Megahorn
moves.description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.
